title: Did Iran direct the Hamas attacks on Israel? Both US and Israel say no hard evidence
description: Experts ABC News spoke with point to Iran as likely helping the terrorist group.

title: Powerball balloons to $1.55 billion for Monday’s drawing
description: The latest prize is the third-largest prize in Powerball history, officials said.

title: Biden says it's 'likely' Americans are among Hamas hostages, 11 killed in conflict
description: President Joe Biden on Monday confirmed at least 11 Americans have been killed in the fighting in Israel, and believes more may have been taken hostage by Hamas.

title: Mast snaps aboard historic Maine schooner, killing 1 and injuring 3
description: Officials say the top portion of a mast snapped and toppled on a historic excursion vessel, killing one person and injuring others aboard the Grace Bailey schooner off the coast of Maine

title: South Carolina nuclear plant gets yellow warning over another cracked emergency fuel pipe
description: Cracks were discovered again in an emergency fuel line at the plant.

title: Louisiana public school principal apologizes after punishing student for dancing at a party
description: A Louisiana public school principal also questioned her religious beliefs.

title: Native Americans celebrate their histories and cultures on Indigenous Peoples Day
description: Native Americans are celebrating their histories and cultures with events across the country marking Indigenous Peoples Day

title: Federal Reserve officials: Bond yields spike may allow central bank to leave rates
description: Two Federal Reserve officials suggested that the central bank may leave interest rates unchanged at its next meeting in three weeks because a surge in long-term interest rates has made borrowing more expensive and could help cool inflation without furt...

title: Palestinian civilians suffer in Israel-Hamas crossfire as death toll rises
description: The citizens of the Gaza Strip are caught in the crossfires in ongoing tensions between the militant group Hamas that controls Palestinian lands and Israeli forces.

title: Senior Taliban officials visit villages struck by deadly quake
description: Saturday's magnitude 6.3 quake hit a densely populated area in Herat.

title: Suspects sought in Pennsylvania community center shooting that killed 1, wounded 8
description: Authorities are seeking suspects in a shooting that killed one man and wounded eight other people at a private party in a Pennsylvania community center

title: Dak Prescott calls Cowboys' loss vs 49ers 'the most humbling game' he's played
description: The frustration from back-to-back playoff losses to San Francisco that both ended on odd plays turned to humiliation for the Dallas Cowboys

title: Bob Odenkirk and daughter Erin have turned his zany poems into a kids' book
description: The father-daughter duo looks back fondly on the time of collaboration.

title: Celebrity chef, Napa Valley restaurateur Michael Chiarello dies at 61
description: Chef and restarateur Michael Chiarello died at Queen of the Valley Medical Center in Napa, California, on Friday.

title: Workers at Mack Trucks go on strike after rejecting tentative contract deal
description: Union workers at Mack Trucks are on strike after voting down a tentative five-year contract agreement that negotiators had reached with the company

title: Founder of Joby Aviation says electric air taxis will be in service in 2025
description: Joby Aviation is working to develop electric-powered aircraft that will take off and land like a helicopter but fly like a small plane

title: WEB - LINK - BREAKING NEWS LIVE BLOG
Major airlines suspend flights to Israel after massive attack by Hamas
description: Major airlines are suspending flights to Israel after it formally declared war following a massive attack by Hamas

title: Ex-Goldman Sachs banker convicted in looting 1MDB fund to help recover assets
description: A former Goldman Sachs executive convicted in the United States in the multibillion-dollar ransacking of a Malaysian sovereign wealth fund has been brought back to the country to assist in asset recovery efforts

title: Flights at Hamburg Airport suspended after a threat against a plane from Iran
description: Officials say flights to and from Hamburg Airport have been suspended after authorities received a threat to a plane that arrived from Iran

title: What is Hamas? Militant group behind surprise Israel attack has ruled Gaza for years
description: Hamas, the militant group that rules the Gaza Strip, shocked Israel and other countries on Saturday with an unexpectedly complex and deadly attack

title: WATCH:  Massive explosion seen along Gaza skyline as Israel continues strikes
description: A massive explosion was seen along the Gaza City skyline as Israel continues airstrikes in response to Saturday’s unprecedented attack by the militant group Hamas.

title: WATCH:  Drone shows aftermath of deadly attack on Israeli music festival
description: Drone footage shows the destruction at a Israeli music festival, which was one of the first targets of Hamas militants who crossed into Israel Saturday in the biggest attack on the country in decades.

title: Timeline of surprise rocket attack by Hamas on Israel
description: As Israelis were wrapping up the seven-day-long Jewish festival of Sukkot on Saturday, the horrifying sounds of sirens echoed across their country.

title: Evacuations ordered as remnants of Typhoon Koinu hit southern China
description: People have been moved to shelters and nearly 2,000 boats recalled to port as the remnants of Typhoon Koinu hit southern China after leaving one dead and over 300 injured in Taiwan

title: Heavy flooding in southern Myanmar displaces more than 10,000 people
description: Flooding triggered by heavy monsoon rains in Myanmar’s southern areas has displaced more than 10,000 people and disrupted traffic on the rail lines that connect the country’s biggest cities

title: Nobel economics prize goes to professor for study of women’s labor market outcomes
description: The Nobel economics prize has been awarded to Claudia Goldin, a professor at Harvard University, for research that has advanced the understanding of the gender gap in the labor market

title: US Senate Majority Leader Schumer criticizes China for not supporting Israel
description: U.S. Senate Majority Leader Schumer has told Chinese President Xi Jinping in a rare meeting that he was very disappointed by China’s failure to strongly condemn the recent Hamas attack on Israel and show sympathy for the country and its people

title: American Airlines pilot union calls for stopping flights to Israel, citing war
description: The pilots' union for American Airlines has directed its members to refuse to fly to Israel, citing the ongoing war between Israel and the Palestinians in Gaza

title: A mother's agony: Israeli mom worried Hamas took her daughter hostage
description: As Jennifer Damti sat between her two daughters in her Tel Aviv home Sunday, she was unable to hold back tears.
